metadata.title: CVE-2021-43331 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In GNU Mailman before 2.1.36, a crafted URL to the Cgi/options.py useroptions page can execute arbitrary JavaScript for XSS.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-43331` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mailman - 1:2.1.26-1ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mailman package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.1.26-1ubuntu0.5').
